alert.note: Alert for Labette (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 8:41PM CDT until September 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LABETTE COUNTY... At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Edna, or 11 miles east of Coffeyville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Labette County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
